General.Name: Boa Safra Sementes S.A
General.Description: Boa Safra Sementes S.A. produces and sells soybean seeds in Brazil. It also offers corn and bean seeds. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Formosa, Brazil.

1.Name: Mr. Felipe Pereira Marques
1.Title: Chief Financial & Investor Relations Officer and Member of Management Board

2.Name: Mr. Ademir  Bau Meller
2.Title: Director of Commercial & Production and Member of Exec. Board

3.Name: Mr. Glaube Sousa Caldas
3.Title: Director of Admin., Control, Technology & Innovation and Member of Exec. Board
